definition: Science and technology is the number one productive force (from 1978 speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平 introducing the Four Modernizations 四個現代化|四个现代化).
pinyin: ke1 xue2 ji4 shu4 shi4 di4 yi1 sheng1 chan3 li4
simplified: 科学技术是第一生产力
word: 科學技術是第一生產力
